description: So far, I can give only a single star as the application does not open. Or rather, it gives only the upper bar with blue_bubbles_app at the center then just sits there with no prompts or anything else so no opportunity other than that to test it.

Quite an amazing app as it enables me to use linux full-time and use iMessage on it. The snap version of this app seems to crash every 2 - 3 days, however. I wind up having to completely remove --purge it and completely reinstall :/
summary: Great app. Snap version appears to crash every 2 - 3 days

description: This app really is iMessage on every platform. Thanks to their private API, they even have reactions, location, etc. It's really amazing. You can use an old mac with OpenCore Legacy Patcher, so that this mac is an iMessage server, low consumption. I recommend 200%
